channel.title: [BETA]TheIsland
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.auto-rune.co.uk/images/sig1.bmp[/img][/center] [center][b]Videos.[/b][/center] [center][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6q9S3TOikhk]Preview One[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0O8rFQcyvjw]Preview Two[/url] [/center] Sponsers: [url=http://forum.rune-mafia.com]Rune-Mafia[/url] [url=http://www.2atoms.com/game/play/teletubbies_mk.htm]TeleTubbies Mercy Killing(GAME).[/url] [url=http://fallenworld.net]Fallen-World(Created by Sir Pk Poon).[/url] PLEASE DONT DO THIS TO ME: [quote="motoxnick"]Thats acctually an hamachi server............................that im owner of plz dont decline[/quote] [quote="yanix"]Hey i whana try ur server.. wheres the ip? :confused:[/quote] Thanks. Sponser app:
Name/server: URL: Approved(Sites only)by Moparscape staff?:
Not taking pics, wait till preview 3. C|P'd from http://forum.rune-mafia.com/showthread.php?t=105. BETA Update. BETA may NOT be this weekend sorry guys :( Sprite Work: Today, ive been working on sprite work :) What I'm planning on doing is mixing acients with lunar. Like all the best spells from each other and mixing :) I would start server-side work but rune-server is down and i need the veng from there =/ Also, when i have the time, i will be doing custom staticons. Ive done attack :). So there you've got future and current updates. After i finish the sprite updates ill post a pic :) There is also a new GFrame :) Also, the name of the spell list is TheIsland Magic. Behind the TheIsland clan. I'm not saying to much untill public as i want it as a suprise :)(so better don't release), its all to do with a crazy story line :) Lets just say your related to my Goober men ;). UPDATE: Today i added range for Dark Bows. My dragon arrows are bugged until i figure out how to fix :( So we are stuck with rune arrows for now. And you can't one hit k0 and sometimes you might get a double hit. Also has anti-mass, rate is not that fast. Range on NPCS is ****'d atm. Will fix these bugs after beta. Also added in a "glyder". If you have a "fly Ticket" you use it on the glyder and you can fly to Kana(Main isle). Im starting to add in the bonuses for items :) tommrow, most items will have their bonuses. Skillcapes will have none for the time being. Beta list: Rune-Mafia Betas: Jukk - Mabye coming lol. Rich dude. Impressions [hr] Moparscape BETAS: DD - - - - - - - - BETA Info. I'll start accepting apps for beta. use this: [code] Name: Report ALL bugs?: Will not ask for mod/admin?: why i should choose you: [/code] My list of updates: [ul][*]Added in my client items [*]changed starting area [*]added in 2 new npcs [*]removed loads of *** commands [*]Changed alot of the text [*]added in my own framesIDS.[/ul] Need to/doing: [ul][*]Adding in my own type of flying [*]Start work on the main isle[/ul] Thanks list: [ul][*]Thanks to Jukk for the Islander NPC[/ul] Pictures: [img]http://www.auto-rune.co.uk/images/newbg.bmp[/img] [img]http://www.auto-rune.co.uk/images/startingisle1.bmp[/img]

item.title: [BETA]TheIsland
item.dc:creator: @I_Samn_I I Samn I
item.description:
@I_Samn_I wrote:

[center][/center]
[center]Videos.[/center]
[center]Preview One
Preview Two
[/center]

Sponsers:
Rune-Mafia
TeleTubbies Mercy Killing(GAME).
Fallen-World(Created by Sir Pk Poon).

PLEASE DONT DO THIS TO ME:

motoxnick:

Thats acctually an hamachi server…that im owner of plz dont decline

yanix:

Hey i whana try ur server… wheres the ip?

Thanks.

Sponser app:

Name/server: URL: Approved(Sites only)by Moparscape staff?:

Not taking pics, wait till preview 3.

C|P’d from http://forum.rune-mafia.com/showthread.php?t=105.

BETA Update.
BETA may NOT be this weekend sorry guys

Sprite Work:
Today, ive been working on sprite work
What I’m planning on doing is mixing acients with lunar. Like all the best spells from each other and mixing I would start server-side work but rune-server is down and i need the veng from there =/
Also, when i have the time, i will be doing custom staticons. Ive done attack :).
So there you’ve got future and current updates. After i finish the sprite updates ill post a pic There is also a new GFrame

Also, the name of the spell list is TheIsland Magic.

Behind the TheIsland clan.
I’m not saying to much untill public as i want it as a suprise :)(so better don’t release), its all to do with a crazy story line Lets just say your related to my Goober men ;).

UPDATE:
Today i added range for Dark Bows. My dragon arrows are bugged until i figure out how to fix
So we are stuck with rune arrows for now. And you can’t one hit k0 and sometimes you might get a double hit. Also has anti-mass, rate is not that fast. Range on NPCS is ****'d atm. Will fix these bugs after beta.

Also added in a “glyder”. If you have a “fly Ticket” you use it on the glyder and you can fly to Kana(Main isle).

Im starting to add in the bonuses for items tommrow, most items will have their bonuses. Skillcapes will have none for the time being.

Beta list:
Rune-Mafia Betas:
Jukk - Mabye coming lol.
Rich dude.
Impressions

[hr]
Moparscape BETAS:
DD

BETA Info.
I’ll start accepting apps for beta.
use this:

Name:
Report ALL bugs?:
Will not ask for mod/admin?:
why i should choose you:

My list of updates:

[ul][]Added in my client items
[]changed starting area
[]added in 2 new npcs
[]removed loads of *** commands
[]Changed alot of the text
[]added in my own framesIDS.[/ul]

Need to/doing:

[ul][]Adding in my own type of flying
[]Start work on the main isle[/ul]

Thanks list:

[ul][*]Thanks to Jukk for the Islander NPC[/ul]

Pictures:
